kaleidoscope.name: Rainbow Prism Pendant
kaleidoscope.description: A stunning pendant featuring a rare Persian turquoise center stone surrounded by diamonds in a kaleidoscope pattern
kaleidoscope.detailed_description: This exquisite pendant showcases the finest Persian turquoise, carefully selected for its vibrant color and natural matrix patterns. The center stone is surrounded by brilliantly cut diamonds arranged in a mesmerizing kaleidoscope design, creating an ever-changing play of light and color.
kaleidoscope.care_instructions: Clean with soft cloth. Avoid harsh chemicals. Store separately to prevent scratching.

seo.title: Rainbow Prism Persian Turquoise Pendant | Parisa London
seo.description: Luxury Persian turquoise pendant with diamond kaleidoscope setting. Handcrafted 18k gold jewelry from Parisa London's exclusive collection.
